Description: Determines if the specified character is a digit.
Determines if the specified character is a letter.
Determines if the specified character is a letter or a digit.
Determines if the specified character is in lowercase.
Determines if the specified character is in uppercase.
Determines if the specified character is a whitespace character.
Converts the specified character to lowercase.
Converts the specified character to uppercase.
Determines if the specified character has a defined Unicode character value.
Determines if the specified character should be regarded as an ignorable character in a Java identifier.
Determines if the specified character may be part of a Java identifier.
Determines if the specified character is permissible as the first character in a Java identifier.
Determines if the specified character is a Unicode space character.
Returns the numeric value of the specified character.
Determines the number of chars needed to represent the specified Unicode code point.
Returns the code point at the specified index.
Returns the code point preceding the specified index.
Returns the number of Unicode code points in the specified text range.
Compares two characters numerically.
Returns a String object representing the specified character.
